full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 114 of 247 242 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross 1 Q. So you wouldn't stay in the island residence, you'd stay at St. Thomas? 2 A. I would bring the helicopter back and the crew would stay on St. Thomas in a regular hotel. 3 Q. Now, we saw a number of photographs of Little St. James Island when you were on your direct testimony. 4 Do you remember those? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. I'm not going to call them up, there were a number of them. But you recall that they had structures on the property in those photographs; right? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. They had the fully built houses on those photographs; right? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Well, when Epstein first bought the property, those houses weren't there; right? 11 A. Some of the buildings were not there. He added buildings, yes. 12 Q. So there was a fair amount of construction to make the island look the way it was in those photographs; right? 13 A. That is correct. 14 Q. And was it about -- was it roughly '97 when he purchased the property? 15 A. It was the late '90s, correct. I don't know the exact SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011886

text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 114 of 247 242 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross

Q. So you wouldn't stay in the island residence, you'd stay at St. Thomas? A. I would bring the helicopter back and the crew would stay on St. Thomas in a regular hotel. Q. Now, we saw a number of photographs of Little St. James Island when you were on your direct testimony. Do you remember those? A. Yes. Q. I'm not going to call them up, there were a number of them. But you recall that they had structures on the property in those photographs; right? A. Yes. Q. They had the fully built houses on those photographs; right? A. Yes. Q. Well, when Epstein first bought the property, those houses weren't there; right? A. Some of the buildings were not there. He added buildings, yes. Q. So there was a fair amount of construction to make the island look the way it was in those photographs; right? A. That is correct. Q. And was it about -- was it roughly '97 when he purchased the property? A. It was the late '90s, correct. I don't know the exact
